column1: #Text=Does anyone expect to see the same cabbie day after day?
#Text=Or even to see them ever again?
#Text=The obnoxious colour they paint their cars is the only thing that bears any continuity for a paying customer.
#Text=Beyond that, they get into a Camry one day, a Crown Vic another, one is maintained and clean, another is a falling apart jalopy.
#Text=That is just not a selling point.
